# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words :: Vector{SubString} = split(text, r"(\s+)")
    line :: String = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            line *= "\n" * (text_width - length(line) % text_width)
            line *= word
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end
    return line
end

# Example
wrap_string("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.", 15)
```
Output:
```
"The quick brown fox\njumps over the\nlazy dog."
```
